author: Milwaukee Journal Sentinel, Mark Johnson, Milwaukee Journal Sentinel
title: Tests of potential coronavirus vaccine spur growth of virus-fighting antibodies
description: Vaccines often take years to receive approval from the U.S. Food and Drug Administration. Coronavirus researchers seek a fast track.
content:
A potential vaccine for COVID-19 has been developed and tested successfully in mice, researchers reported Thursday.
"We'd like to get this into patients as soon as possible," said Andrea Gambotto, associate professor of surgery at the University of Pittsburg… [+6599 chars]
